content.raw: it would just allow us to merge this pull asynchronously with the gazebo qt5 pull request, a short-term benefit

content.raw: Is there a particular reason why we need both at the same time? qt is not small both in number of packages and size, I would prefer going with a minimal set of packages if possible. It's not a big problem install both but I tried to optimise the approach.
content.html: Is there a particular reason why we need both at the same time? qt is not small both in number of packages and size, I would prefer going with a minimal set of packages if possible. It's not a big problem install both but I tried to optimise the approach.

content.html: I believe we can install qt4 and qt5 side-by-side. We could modify this to install both.
